author: 0xunclebill
content:
Hey all, sorry for being MIA a bit, got caught up with other things. Just wanted to mention that Lighthouse is finally interoping succesfully with other clients 

The relevant lighthouse branch can be found here:
https://github.com/eserilev/lighthouse/tree/electra-focil-branch

and the kurtosis config I was using


```
participants:
  - el_type: geth
    el_image: jihoonsg/geth-focil:9f03028
    cl_type: lighthouse
    cl_image: eserilev/lighthouse:focil
    cl_log_level: info
  - el_type: geth
    el_image: jihoonsg/geth-focil:9f03028
    cl_type: prysm
    cl_image: jihoonsg/prysm-beacon-chain-focil:9d26fe2
    vc_type: prysm
    vc_image: jihoonsg/prysm-validator-focil:9d26fe2
  - el_type: geth
    el_image: jihoonsg/geth-focil:9f03028
    cl_type: lodestar
    cl_image: ethpandaops/lodestar:focil
  - el_type: geth
    el_image: jihoonsg/geth-focil:9f03028
    cl_type: teku
    cl_image: ethpandaops/teku:focil
network_params:
  genesis_delay: 60
  electra_fork_epoch: 0
  eip7805_fork_epoch: 1
  num_validator_keys_per_node: 256
additional_services:
  - dora
  - prometheus_grafana
  - tx_fuzz
```


Sorry it took so long, took me much longer than I thought to debug a few issues. Thanks <@845691100072509460> for reviewing the branch and flagging a few issues

Unfortunately I wont be at interop this week but will be online and in a similar timezone if anything comes up!

There are probably still a few small bugs in lighthouse wrt to focil, ill be working over the next few days to get any additional kinks out
